video_prompt: A woman with flowing black hair shifts her casual pose, her hand subtly adjusting the white jacket. Her striking green eyes subtly widen, her lips form a faint smile. The graffiti wall behind her subtly blurs as the light shifts, indicating the passage of time.
image_prompt: Anime woman, black hair, green eyes, white crop top, frayed denim shorts, black choker, confident pose, in front of a graffiti wall (Japanese characters, teal, red, "C29"). Urban setting, subtle shadows, vibrant color palette.
refined_video_prompt: A woman subtly shifts her pose, her hand adjusting her jacket. Her eyes gradually widen, and a faint smile forms on her lips. Her hair gently sways. Behind her, the graffiti wall subtly blurs as the lighting dynamically shifts.
